item.title: Publications

item.title: About
item.description: Hello my Dear Reader! I am Yin Minn Pa Pa, originally from Myanmar and currently working at Japan as security researcher. I finished Ph.D in computer engineering in 2016 from Yokohama National University, Japan. My research interests include: Network security Malware Analysis IoT security Web security This site is made to document what I learn and share it to burmese learners. Most contents will be written in burmese because learning with mother toung is the easiest way to grasp the point.
